channel.title: Web-client question
channel.description:
Hi, I'm not very good working with clients and was wondering what the most simple base would be to put a web-client on. Ive done multiple tutorials on PI and Delta and have only achieved in headaches.
I don't want a base web-client ready. Id like to learn myself :) All feedback is appreciated thank-you
